# transport

**Instance Property**

The data transport for the device.

## Declaration

```swift
var transport: HIDDeviceTransport?
```

## Discussion

A[doc://com.apple.CoreHID/documentation/CoreHID/HIDDeviceTransport] that specifies the type of transport that the data sent to and from the device  uses.
title: transport
